title: AoMI 60 - Avengers Endgame Trailer
body:
AoMI 60 – Avengers Endgame Trailer

In this episode, we talk about a lot of the obvious things going on.  The new Hellboy trailer, Avengers Endgame Theories, Captain Marvel, and BrightBurn.  The most unexpected thing is probably our foray into Quantum Leap Fan Fiction.  So take a leap with us as we go over a little of the new and a little of the old as we visit some short-lived 80’s TV shows.  All this and more in the latest…

View On WordPress

summary: Il potere di Captain Marvel nel primo spot tv intitolato Born Free
title: Il potere di Captain Marvel nel primo spot tv intitolato Born Free
body:
Il potere di #CaptainMarvel nel primo spot tv intitolato Born Free

I Marvel Studios hanno rilasciato nelle ultime ore il primo spot tv di Captain Marvel, il nuovo cinecomic parte del Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Lo spot tv, privo di sequenze inedite, ma con un montaggio molto scoppiettante, prende il titolo di Born Free.

Captain Marvel è diretto da Anna Boden e Ryan Fleck. La sceneggiatura è di Ginevra Robertson-Dworet e Nicole Perlman. Nel cast Brie…

blog.name: bringbackgenisvellandphylavell
blog.title: Bring back Genis and Phyla Vell
blog.description:
Site dedicated to all things Genis-Vell and Phyla-Vell. Former Captains Marvel and son and daughter of the original one, Mar-Vell. They were killed off very soon by Marvel and they deserve a second chance, we don't ask about a new chance as Captains Marvel but to come back to the Cosmic Marvel Universe (Quasar, Photon, Legacy, Martyr, whatever). 

Posts about Genis and Phyla. Mar-Vell, Rick Jones, Guardians of the Galaxy, Adam Warlock, Quasar, Thanos, Starlin stuff, some Avengers and a lot of Cosmic stuff. Welcome!

body:
Liberan nuevo promocional de Captain Marvel para la TV

Marvel empieza a acelerar el movimiento de los promocionales de la primera película de su Universo Cinematográfico de 2019: Captain Marvel con un nuevo tráiler exclusivo para la TV.

Aunque prácticamente no hay escenas nuevas, hay un segundo o dos de momentos de la película que no habíamos visto antes.

La película se estrenará el 8…

summary: Just here to say Convergence: Shazam has been one of the best Captain Marvel reads I've had. You guy's really got the Captain...
question: Just here to say Convergence: Shazam has been one of the best Captain Marvel reads I've had. You guy's really got the Captain right and used his already existing villians and history really well. Will you do more Captain Marvel stuff in the future? Your art for the book was great
answer:
Thanks very much! The best part of that gig going in was knowing we’d get to use pretty much everybody we wanted and then some. Knowing there was a good chance it was my only shot to draw most of these characters I really wanted to get as much juice out of it as possible.

I would love to do more with this character, but I wouldn’t hold my breath. In case any of you haven’t heard a new Shazam! #1 launched this past month, and it’s a great read but solidly moves forward with what Geoff Johns and Gary Frank built a few years ago. They don’t need me in there gumming up the works, and on top of that I would understand if it was felt that I’m too closely identified with the classic “Captain Marvel” while they’re trying to remain current and do something new. I mean, that would stink, but I’d get it. And to be clear I’m not saying I think I’m being unfairly blacklisted from the new iteration of the character or something. Geoff’s great, Dale’s great, Sen’s great.

I’ve always said that if all I ever get to do with the character is Convergence: Shazam!, then I’m content. And hearing stuff like this is always a nice reminder, so thank you again.

I would love to do more with this character, but I wouldn’t hold my breath. In case any of you haven’t heard a new Shazam! #1 launched this past month, and it’s a great read but solidly moves forward with what Geoff Johns and Gary Frank built a few years ago. They don’t need me in there gumming up the works, and on top of that I would understand if it was felt that I’m too closely identified with the classic “Captain Marvel” while they’re trying to remain current and do something new. I mean, that would stink, but I’d get it. And to be clear I’m not saying I think I’m being unfairly blacklisted from the new iteration of the character or something. summary: JOIN THE FUN AT THE VALHALLA VIEW APARTMENTS! Come be part of the most luxurious residential building in Manhattan. Like the...
body:
JOIN THE FUN AT THE VALHALLA VIEW APARTMENTS!

Come be part of the most luxurious residential building in Manhattan. Like the snow in winter, you’re guaranteed to fall for the apartments at Valhalla View! In Valhalla View residents not only get a cushy apartment and plenty of amenities but they also receive the company of their neighbors! Come be part of a community of extraordinary people and lease an apartment today.

Kosmopolites is a neighbor / city AU roleplay where your character is a resident of the Valhalla View building, an apartment building located in the heart of Manhattan. As a resident you will be able to form bonds with the other residents, pick up a job in the city, discover new things and create new adventures in the form of hangouts at the diner or lounge, romances or events in the building!

MAIN | PREMISE | RULES | APPLY | MASTERLIST (Mobile ver) | QUESTIONS
